section.heading: Child support orders for 2 or more obligees.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 16-137, in the section heading, deleted “Multiple” preceding “child”; and deleted “multiple” preceding “registrations” and “orders”.
Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: “This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007.”
Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 208 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
